DOC.brief_summary: The aim study improve management patient cardiac arrest , compare two initial airway management method : Tracheal intubation bag-valve-mask ventilation . The survival rate 28-day favorable neurological function compare tracheal intubation group versus bag-valve-mask group
DOC.brief_title: Tracheal Intubation vs. Bag-valve-mask Ventilation Patients With Out-of-Hospital Cardiac Arrest _ CAAM STUDY
DOC.detailed_description: It multicenter prospective non-inferiority open randomize controlled trial patient out-of-hospital cardiac arrest carry physician-staffed emergency medical service . The investigator hypothesis basic airway management ( i.e . bag-valve-mask ventilation ) safe may avoid deleterious effect tracheal intubation include interruption chest compression . On medical team 's arrival scene verification participant 's eligibility , patient enrol study randomly assign either initial bag-valve-mask ventilation tracheal intubation . After hospital admission , patient intubate whatever initial airway management .
